meanings.definition: To bring two or more things together to form a whole.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys combining different colors to create beautiful paintings.
meanings.sent2: The chef is combining various ingredients to make a delicious soup.
meanings.sent3: The magician is combining different cards to perform a mesmerizing trick.
meanings.sent4: In cooking, combining flavors is like creating a symphony of taste.
meanings.sent5: By combining her skills and knowledge, she became a successful entrepreneur.

meanings.definition: To unite or merge different elements or qualities.
meanings.sent1: The team is combining their efforts to achieve a common goal.
meanings.sent2: The artist is combining different art styles to create a unique masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The students are combining their ideas to come up with a creative project.
meanings.sent4: In music, combining different instruments can produce a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent5: By combining hard work and determination, he reached his dreams.

meanings.definition: The act of joining or mixing things together.
meanings.sent1: The combining of ingredients is crucial in baking a cake.
meanings.sent2: The combining of colors in the painting created a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The combining of flavors in the dish made it a culinary delight.
meanings.sent4: The combining of different genres in the movie made it a box office hit.
meanings.sent5: The combining of efforts from all team members led to a successful project completion.
